climbs.name: Stop, Climb, and Roll
climbs.fa: David Reiss-Mello and Nick Ambrosio, August 2019

content.description: Great hold for left hand close to the top of the boulder.
content.location: Enter trail on intersection between northside drive and southside drive. Walk on the trail along northside drive for about 4-6 minutes. The problem will be on the right.

climbs.name: Rockaway Reach
climbs.fa: NIck Ambrosio and David Reiss-Mello, August 2019

content.description: Start on left and do a dynamic move to the hold on the right.
content.location: Enter trail on intersection between northside drive and southside drive. Walk on the trail along northside drive for about 6-7 minutes. The problem will be on the right.

climbs.name: Big Flapper
climbs.fa: Nick Ambrosio and David Reiss-Mello, August 2019

content.description: Use jugs as handholds and smear for the feet.
content.location: Enter trail on intersection between northside drive and southside drive. Walk on the trail along northside drive for about 3-4 minutes. The problem will be on the right.
